item.title: How-To: Center anything with Flexbox
item.description: While learning Flexbox somthing I had quite some problem trying to figure out how to center an element on a page with CSS and Flexbox, its not that difficult but sometimes you just don’t see the easy solution when its right in fromt of you. #element{ display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; I hope this can help some of you. Enjoy!
